title: Keep Going! Modeling Michael Jordan's Success Story
description: If you have ever heard your kids complain about not being good enough or quitting too soon this is the story your kids should know so they can Keep Going!Keep Going! A Guide to Facing Obstacle for Kids. Is a short story that teaches, in a different way, to the little ones of the house, that we all make mistakes, and sometimes we fail. Our children will learn through this story that, when they faced with obstacles in their lifeâ€™s path, with perseverance, they can get up, learn from their mistakes, and Keep Going!
author: Mayra A. Diaz
